bibl.title: Observations on Either Acculturation or Constancy of the Indigenous Culture and Society in Hellenistic Egypt.
Egitto e storia antica. Atti del Colloquio internazionale. Bologna, 31.8-2.9.1987
bibl.author: Kanazawa, Yoshiki

bibl.note: The Egyptian society and culture stood rather unchanged in its essence against the popular view on Hellenism.
Kanazawa Yoshiki, Observations on Either Acculturation or Constancy of the Indigenous Culture and Society in Hellenistic Egypt.
Egitto e storia antica. Atti del Colloquio internazionale. Bologna, 31.8-2.9.1987 (Bologna, 1989) pp. 475-489.
